name: Gravity Fight!
description:
Take Asteroids and re-imagine it with gravity from the asteroids influencing the movement of your ship. This was an idea I prototyped for the Entelect-Jam. We were given an initial project with some basic controls and work from there. Kudos to Kenney Space Shooter Redux for the cool art!

Controls are as follows:

  • Turn ship: Left & Right Arrow
  • Fire thruster: Up Arrow
  • Fire Lasers: Space bar
To close the game just Alt+F4.
